original_text: But these, like irrational animals, creatures of instinct, born to be caught and destroyed, blaspheming about matters of which they are ignorant, will also be destroyed in their destruction,
korean_text: 그러나 이 사람들은 본래 잡혀 죽기 위하여 난 이성 없는 짐승 같아서 그 알지 못하는 것을 비방하고 그들의 멸망 가운데서 멸망을 당하며

sentences.original_text: born to be caught and destroyed,
blaspheming about matters of which they are ignorant,
will also be destroyed in their destruction,
sentences.korean_translation: 자신들의 멸망 중에서 또한 멸망을 당할 것입니다.
